main event: A 12-year-old boy reported seeing a 'flying saucer' in 1958 near Collinsville, Illinois.
interesting points: The object appeared round with a 'bump on top' and was an odd greenish-white color with purple lights, possibly coming from windows.
The object moved faster than any jet and made a 90-degree turn before flying north.
The object descended from a very high altitude and was observed for about 2 seconds.
The Air Force analyst noted that the boy may have misinterpreted a fireball or oscillating object due to his young age and potentially dusty window.
The analyst also stated there was very little information to form a valid conclusion about the nature of the sighting.
sighted object: a round, 'flying saucer'-like object with flashing lights
